original_text: Then God will bring you safely into the kingdom of our Lord Jesus Christ that continues for ever. Jesus Christ is our Saviour and God will be happy to welcome you into his kingdom.
korean_text: 이같이 하면 우리 주 곧 구주 예수 그리스도의 영원한 나라에 들어감을 넉넉히 너희에게 주시리라

sentences.original_text: Then God will bring you safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 안전하게 당신을 인도하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: into the kingdom of our Lord Jesus Christ
to welcome you into his kingdom.
